verses.verse: It happened in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> when there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>living<s%> on the farther <S%H3411>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> to him a <S%H802>concubine<s%> out of Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah.<s%>

His <S%H6370>concubine<s%> played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> against <S%H3212>him,<s%> and went away from him to her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> to Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah,<s%> and was there the space of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

Her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1696>her,<s%> to speak <S%H3820>kindly<s%> to <S%H7725>her,<s%> to bring her again, having his <S%H5288>servant<s%> with <S%H6776>him,<s%> and a couple of <S%H2543>donkeys:<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%> and when the <S%H1>father<s%> of the young <S%H5291>lady<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8055>him,<s%> he rejoiced to meet <S%H7125>him.<s%>

His <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H2388>retained<s%> <S%H3427>him;<s%> and he stayed with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so they <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and lodged <S%H3885>there.<s%>

It happened on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart:<s%> and the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law, <S%H5582>"Strengthen<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> with a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall go your <S%H3212>way.<s%>"

So they sat <S%H3427>down,<s%> <S%H398>ate,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together:<s%> and the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man,<s%> "Please be <S%H2974>pleased<s%> to stay all <S%H3885>night,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry.<s%>"
The <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart;<s%> but his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H6484>urged<s%> <S%H3885>him,<s%> and he lodged there <S%H7725>again.<s%>

He arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3212>depart;<s%> and the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H4102>stay<s%> until the day <S%H3117>declines;<s%>" and they <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H398>ate.<s%>

When the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart,<s%> <S%H6370>he,<s%> and his concubine, and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3117>him,<s%> "Behold, now the day <S%H7503>draws<s%> toward <S%H6150>evening,<s%> please stay all <S%H3885>night:<s%> <S%H3117>behold,<s%> the day grows to an <S%H2583>end,<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H3824>here,<s%> that your heart may be <S%H3190>merry;<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> go on your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H7925>early,<s%> that you may <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H168>home.<s%>"

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> stay that <S%H3885>night,<s%> but he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> (the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>): and there were with him a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H2280>saddled;<s%> his concubine also was with <S%H6370>him.<s%>

When they were by <S%H2982>Jebus,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H7286>spent;<s%> and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> "Please <S%H3212>come<s%> and let us turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> into this <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and lodge in <S%H3885>it.<s%>"

His <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5493>him,<s%> "We won't turn aside into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of a <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> that is not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but we will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come<s%> and let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places;<s%> and we will <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> or in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>"
So they passed <S%H5674>on<s%> and went their <S%H3212>way;<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down<s%> on them <S%H681>near<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> which belongs to <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

They turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H935>there,<s%> to go in to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> and he went <S%H935>in,<s%> and sat him <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for there was no <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H622>took<s%> them into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge.<s%>

<S%H935>Behold,<s%> there came an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>work<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H6153>evening:<s%> now the man <S%H376>was<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and he <S%H1481>lived<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> but the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites.<s%>

He lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Where are you <S%H3212>going?<s%> <S%H370>Where<s%> did you come <S%H935>from?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>him,<s%> "We are passing from Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah<s%> to the farther <S%H3411>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%> I am from <S%H3212>there,<s%> and I went to Bethlehem <S%H1035>Judah.<s%> I am <S%H1980>going<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and there is no <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H622>takes<s%> me into his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Yet there <S%H3426>is<s%> both <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for our <S%H2543>donkeys;<s%> and there is <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> also for <S%H519>me,<s%> and for your handmaid, and for the young <S%H5288>man<s%> who is with your <S%H5650>servants:<s%> there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> of <S%H1697>anything.<s%>"

The <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peace<s%> be to <S%H7535>you;<s%> howsoever let all your <S%H4270>wants<s%> lie on <S%H3885>me;<s%> only don't lodge in the <S%H7339>street.<s%>"

So he <S%H935>brought<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and gave the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H1101>fodder;<s%> and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

As they were making their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3190>merry,<s%> <S%H582>behold,<s%> the men of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H582>fellows,<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H5437>the<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1849>beating<s%> at the <S%H1817>door;<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> into your <S%H1004>house,<s%> that we may have sex with <S%H3045>him!<s%>"

The <S%H376>man,<s%> the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> and said to <S%H408>them,<s%> "No, my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> please <S%H7489>don't<s%> act so wickedly; <S%H310>since<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6213>don't<s%> do this <S%H5039>folly.<s%>

<S%H1330>Behold,<s%> here is my virgin <S%H1323>daughter<s%> and his <S%H6370>concubine.<s%> I will bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6031>now.<s%> Humble <S%H6213>them,<s%> and do with them what <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H376>you;<s%> but to this man <S%H6213>don't<s%> do <S%H2063>any<s%> <S%H1697>such<s%> <S%H5039>folly.<s%>"

But the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H376>him:<s%> so the man <S%H2388>laid<s%> hold of his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> her <S%H2351>out<s%> to <S%H3045>them;<s%> and they had sex with <S%H5953>her,<s%> and abused her all <S%H3915>night<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and when the <S%H7837>day<s%> began to <S%H5927>dawn,<s%> they let her <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H6437>dawning<s%> of the <S%H1242>day,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> where her <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H216>was,<s%> until it was light.

Her <S%H113>lord<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> his <S%H1870>way;<s%> and <S%H802>behold,<s%> the woman his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H5592>threshold.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>her,<s%> "Get up, and let us be <S%H3212>going!<s%>" but no <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6030>answered.<s%> Then <S%H376>he<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her up on the <S%H2543>donkey;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

When he had <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3979>knife,<s%> and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H5408>divided<s%> <S%H6106>her,<s%> limb by limb, into <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her throughout all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It was <S%H1961>so,<s%> that all who <S%H7200>saw<s%> it <S%H559>said,<s%> "There was no such <S%H2063>deed<s%> done nor <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to this <S%H3117>day!<s%> <S%H7760>Consider<s%> <S%H5779>it,<s%> take counsel, and <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"
